tool_description: Read, write, and sync files stored in Google Drive from your mobile and web apps.
name: GoogleDrive
title: GoogleDrive

api_list.name: getFileComments
api_list.description: Lists a file's comments.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

optional_parameters.name: startModifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The minimum value of 'modifiedTime' for the result comments (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of comments to return per page. Acceptable values are 1 to 100, inclusive. (Default: 20)

optional_parameters.name: includeDeleted
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include deleted comments. Deleted comments will not include their original content. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

api_list.name: copyFile
api_list.description: Lists a file's comments.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the thumbnail.

optional_parameters.name: mimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the file. Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded. If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailImage
optional_parameters.description: The thumbnail data encoded with URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648 section 5).

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A short description of the file.

optional_parameters.name: modifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time). Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

optional_parameters.name: starred
optional_parameters.description: Whether the user has starred the file.

optional_parameters.name: viewersCanCopyContent
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

optional_parameters.name: writersCanShare
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

optional_parameters.name: viewedByMeTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: appProperties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: parents
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file. If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: createFileComment
api_list.description: Creates a new comment on a file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: The plain text content of the comment. This field is used for setting the content, while htmlContent should be displayed.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

optional_parameters.name: quotedFileContentValue
optional_parameters.description: The quoted content itself. This is interpreted as plain text if set through the API.

optional_parameters.name: anchor
optional_parameters.description: A region of the document represented as a JSON string. See anchor documentation for details on how to define and interpret anchor properties.

optional_parameters.name: quotedFileContentMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The quoted content itself. This is interpreted as plain text if set through the API.

api_list.name: createFileFromMetadata
api_list.description: Creates a new file from metadata.For metadata-only requests.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A short description of the file.

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailImage
optional_parameters.description: The thumbnail data encoded with URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648 section 5).

optional_parameters.name: originalFilename
optional_parameters.description: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

optional_parameters.name: modifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time).Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the thumbnail.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

optional_parameters.name: folderColorRgb
optional_parameters.description: The color for a folder as an RGB hex string. The supported colors are published in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource.If an unsupported color is specified, the closest color in the palette will be used instead.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Text to be indexed for the file to improve fullText queries. This is limited to 128KB in length and may contain HTML elements.

optional_parameters.name: mimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the file.Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded.If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

optional_parameters.name: viewedByMeTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: writersCanShare
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

optional_parameters.name: viewersCanCopyContent
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

optional_parameters.name: starred
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: appProperties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: parents
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

api_list.name: createFileFromMultipartData
api_list.description: Creates a new file from upload data/metadata.Maximum file size: 5120GB.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: uploadFile
required_parameters.description: Upload file.

required_parameters.name: contentType
required_parameters.description: Set to the MIME media type of the object being uploaded.

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A short description of the file.

optional_parameters.name: modifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time).Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailImage
optional_parameters.description: The thumbnail data encoded with URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648 section 5).

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: originalFilename
optional_parameters.description: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the thumbnail.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Text to be indexed for the file to improve fullText queries. This is limited to 128KB in length and may contain HTML elements.

optional_parameters.name: mimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the file.Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded.If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

optional_parameters.name: folderColorRgb
optional_parameters.description: The color for a folder as an RGB hex string. The supported colors are published in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource.If an unsupported color is specified, the closest color in the palette will be used instead.

optional_parameters.name: starred
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: viewersCanCopyContent
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

optional_parameters.name: viewedByMeTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: writersCanShare
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

optional_parameters.name: appProperties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: parents
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

api_list.name: createFileFromUpload
api_list.description: A createFileFromUpload is the most straightforward method for uploading a file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: contentType
required_parameters.description: Set to the MIME media type of the object being uploaded.

required_parameters.name: uploadFile
required_parameters.description: Upload file.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

api_list.name: createFilePermission
api_list.description: Creates a permission for a file or Team Drive.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: role
required_parameters.description: The role granted by this permission. While new values may be supported in the future, the following are currently allowed: "organizer", "owner", "writer", "commenter", "reader"

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the grantee. Valid values are: "user", "group", "domain", "anyone"

optional_parameters.name: emailMessage
optional_parameters.description: A custom message to include in the notification email.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: allowFileDiscovery
optional_parameters.description: Whether the permission allows the file to be discovered through search. This is only applicable for permissions of type domain or anyone.

optional_parameters.name: emailAddress
optional_parameters.description: The email address of the user or group to which this permission refers.

optional_parameters.name: sendNotificationEmail
optional_parameters.description: Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups. This defaults to true for users and groups, and is not allowed for other requests. It must not be disabled for ownership transfers.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: The domain to which this permission refers.

optional_parameters.name: transferOwnership
optional_parameters.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer. This parameter is required as an acknowledgement of the side effect. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: createReplyToComment
api_list.description: Creates a new reply to a comment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: The plain text content of the reply. This field is used for setting the content, while htmlContent should be displayed. This is required on creates if no action is specified.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

optional_parameters.name: action
optional_parameters.description: The action the reply performed to the parent comment. Valid values are:, "resolve", "reopen"

api_list.name: createTeamDrive
api_list.description: Creates a new Team Drive.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the team.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: requestId
required_parameters.description: An ID, such as a random UUID, which uniquely identifies this user's request for idempotent creation of a Team Drive. A repeated request by the same user and with the same request ID will avoid creating duplicates by attempting to create the same Team Drive. If the Team Drive already exists a 409 error will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: themeId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the theme from which the background image and color will be set. The set of possible teamDriveThemes can be retrieved from a drive.about.get response. When not specified on a drive.teamdrives.create request, a random theme is chosen from which the background image and color are set. This is a write-only field; it can only be set on requests that don't set colorRgb or backgroundImageFile.

api_list.name: deleteCommentReply
api_list.description: Deletes a reply.

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: replyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the reply.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: deleteFile
api_list.description: Permanently deletes a file owned by the user without moving it to the trash. If the file belongs to a Team Drive the user must be an organizer on the parent. If the target is a folder, all descendants owned by the user are also deleted.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

api_list.name: deleteFileComment
api_list.description: Deletes a comment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

api_list.name: deleteFilePermission
api_list.description: Deletes a permission.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: permissionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the permission.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

api_list.name: deleteFileRevision
api_list.description: Permanently deletes a revision. This method is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive.

required_parameters.name: revisionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the revision.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: deleteTeamDrive
api_list.description: Permanently deletes a Team Drive for which the user is an organizer. The Team Drive cannot contain any untrashed items.

required_parameters.name: teamDriveId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the Team Drive

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

api_list.name: emptyTrash
api_list.description: Permanently deletes all of the user's trashed files.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

api_list.name: exportFile
api_list.description: Exports a Google Doc to the requested MIME type and returns the exported content.

required_parameters.name: mimeType
required_parameters.description: The MIME type of the format requested for this export.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

api_list.name: generateFileIds
api_list.description: Generates a set of file IDs which can be provided in create requests.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: space
optional_parameters.description: The space in which the IDs can be used to create new files. Supported values are 'drive' and 'appDataFolder'.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of IDs to return. Acceptable values are 1 to 1000, inclusive. (Default: 10)

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Get AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Client ID

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Code you received from Google after the user granted access

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Client secret

required_parameters.name: redirectUri
required_parameters.description: The same redirect URL as in received Code step.

api_list.name: getChanges
api_list.description: Lists the changes for a user or Team Drive.

required_parameters.name: pageToken
required_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response or to the response from the getStartPageToken method.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of changes to return per page. Acceptable values are 1 to 1000, inclusive. (Default: 100)

optional_parameters.name: includeRemoved
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include changes indicating that items have been removed from the list of changes, for example by deletion or loss of access. (Default: true)

optional_parameters.name: includeCorpusRemovals
optional_parameters.description: Whether changes should include the file resource if the file is still accessible by the user at the time of the request, even when a file was removed from the list of changes and there will be no further change entries for this file. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: restrictToMyDrive
optional_parameters.description: Whether to restrict the results to changes inside the My Drive hierarchy. This omits changes to files such as those in the Application Data folder or shared files which have not been added to My Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: includeTeamDriveItems
optional_parameters.description: Whether Team Drive files or changes should be included in results. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: teamDriveId
optional_parameters.description: The Team Drive from which changes will be returned. If specified the change IDs will be reflective of the Team Drive; use the combined Team Drive ID and change ID as an identifier.

optional_parameters.name: spaces
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of spaces to query within the user corpus. Supported values are 'drive', 'appDataFolder' and 'photos'.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: getCommentReplies
api_list.description: Lists a comment's replies.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

optional_parameters.name: includeDeleted
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return deleted replies. Deleted replies will not include their original content. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of replies to return per page. Acceptable values are 1 to 100, inclusive. (Default: 20)

api_list.name: getFilePermissions
api_list.description: Lists a file's or Team Drive's permissions.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of permissions to return per page. When not set for files in a Team Drive, at most 100 results will be returned. When not set for files that are not in a Team Drive, the entire list will be returned. Acceptable values are 1 to 100, inclusive.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: getFileRevisions
api_list.description: Lists a file's revisions.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of revisions to return per page. Acceptable values are 1 to 1000, inclusive. (Default: 200)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: getFileSingleComment
api_list.description: Gets a comment by ID.

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

optional_parameters.name: acknowledgeAbuse
optional_parameters.description: Whether the user is acknowledging the risk of downloading known malware or other abusive files. This is only applicable when alt=media. (Default: false)

api_list.name: getFiles
api_list.description: Lists or searches files.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: includeTeamDriveItems
optional_parameters.description: Whether Team Drive items should be included in results. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: corpus
optional_parameters.description: The source of files to list. Deprecated: use 'corpora' instead. Acceptable values are: "domain": Files shared to the user's domain. "user": Files owned by or shared to the user.

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of files to return per page. Partial or empty result pages are possible even before the end of the files list has been reached. Acceptable values are 1 to 1000, inclusive. (Default: 100)

optional_parameters.name: teamDriveId
optional_parameters.description: ID of Team Drive to search

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: A query for filtering the file results. See the "Search for Files" guide for supported syntax.

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: corpora
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of bodies of items (files/documents) to which the query applies. Supported bodies are 'user', 'domain', 'teamDrive' and 'allTeamDrives'. 'allTeamDrives' must be combined with 'user'; all other values must be used in isolation. Prefer 'user' or 'teamDrive' to 'allTeamDrives' for efficiency.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sort keys. Valid keys are 'createdTime', 'folder', 'modifiedByMeTime', 'modifiedTime', 'name', 'quotaBytesUsed', 'recency', 'sharedWithMeTime', 'starred', and 'viewedByMeTime'. Each key sorts ascending by default, but may be reversed with the 'desc' modifier. Example usage: ?orderBy=folder,modifiedTime desc,name. Please note that there is a current limitation for users with approximately one million files in which the requested sort order is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: spaces
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of spaces to query within the user corpus. Supported values are 'drive', 'appDataFolder' and 'photos'.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: refreshToken
api_list.description: Get new accessToken by refreshToken.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Client secret

required_parameters.name: refreshToken
required_parameters.description: A token that you can use to obtain a new access token. Refresh tokens are valid until the user revokes access. Again, this field is only present in this response if you set the access_type parameter to offline in the initial request to Google's authorization server.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Client ID

api_list.name: revokeAccessToken
api_list.description: In some cases a user may wish to revoke access given to an application. A user can revoke access by visiting Account Settings. It is also possible for an application to programmatically revoke the access given to it. Programmatic revocation is important in instances where a user unsubscribes or removes an application. In other words, part of the removal process can include an API request to ensure the permissions granted to the application are removed.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The token can be an access token or a refresh token. If the token is an access token and it has a corresponding refresh token, the refresh token will also be revoked.

api_list.name: stopWatchingChannelResources
api_list.description: Stop watching resources through this channel.

required_parameters.name: kind
required_parameters.description: Identifies this as a notification channel used to watch for changes to a resource. Value: the fixed string "api#channel".

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

required_parameters.name: resourceId
required_parameters.description: An opaque ID that identifies the resource being watched on this channel. Stable across different API versions.

required_parameters.name: resourceUri
required_parameters.description: A version-specific identifier for the watched resource.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The address where notifications are delivered for this channel.

optional_parameters.name: payload
optional_parameters.description: A Boolean value to indicate whether payload is wanted. Optional.

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description: An arbitrary string delivered to the target address with each notification delivered over this channel. Optional.

optional_parameters.name: expiration
optional_parameters.description: Date and time of notification channel expiration, expressed as a Unix timestamp, in milliseconds. Optional.

optional_parameters.name: params
optional_parameters.description: Additional parameters controlling delivery channel behavior. Optional.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the comment.

required_parameters.name: fields

api_list.name: updateFileFromMetadata
api_list.description: A updateFileFromMetadata is the most straightforward method for updating a metadata file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the thumbnail.

optional_parameters.name: mimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the file.Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded.If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Text to be indexed for the file to improve fullText queries. This is limited to 128KB in length and may contain HTML elements.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

optional_parameters.name: folderColorRgb
optional_parameters.description: The color for a folder as an RGB hex string. The supported colors are published in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource.If an unsupported color is specified, the closest color in the palette will be used instead.

optional_parameters.name: originalFilename
optional_parameters.description: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: modifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time).Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailImage
optional_parameters.description: The thumbnail data encoded with URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648 section 5).

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A short description of the file.

optional_parameters.name: viewedByMeTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: writersCanShare
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

optional_parameters.name: viewersCanCopyContent
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

optional_parameters.name: starred
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: appProperties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: parents
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

api_list.name: updateFileFromMultipartData
api_list.description: A updateFileFromMultipartData is the most straightforward method for updating a file.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: contentType
required_parameters.description: Set to the MIME media type of the object being uploaded.

required_parameters.name: uploadFile
required_parameters.description: Upload file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A short description of the file.

optional_parameters.name: originalFilename
optional_parameters.description: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: modifiedTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time).Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsThumbnailImage
optional_parameters.description: The thumbnail data encoded with URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648 section 5).

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Text to be indexed for the file to improve fullText queries. This is limited to 128KB in length and may contain HTML elements.

optional_parameters.name: folderColorRgb
optional_parameters.description: The color for a folder as an RGB hex string. The supported colors are published in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource.If an unsupported color is specified, the closest color in the palette will be used instead.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

optional_parameters.name: contentHintsMimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the thumbnail.

optional_parameters.name: mimeType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the file.Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded.If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

optional_parameters.name: viewedByMeTime
optional_parameters.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

optional_parameters.name: writersCanShare
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

optional_parameters.name: viewersCanCopyContent
optional_parameters.description: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

optional_parameters.name: starred
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: appProperties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

optional_parameters.name: parents
optional_parameters.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

required_parameters.name: uploadFile

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: contentType
required_parameters.description: Set to the MIME media type of the object being uploaded.

optional_parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: ocrLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from parent folders. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives

api_list.name: updateFilePermission
api_list.description: Updates a permission with patch semantics.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: role
required_parameters.description: The role granted by this permission. While new values may be supported in the future, the following are currently allowed: "organizer", "owner", "writer", "commenter", "reader"

optional_parameters.name: permissionId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the permission.

optional_parameters.name: expirationTime
optional_parameters.description: The time at which this permission will expire (RFC 3339 date-time). Expiration times have the following restrictions: They can only be set on user and group permissions. The time must be in the future. The time cannot be more than a year in the future

optional_parameters.name: supportsTeamDrives
optional_parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: removeExpiration
optional_parameters.description: Whether to remove the expiration date. (Default: false)

optional_parameters.name: transferOwnership
optional_parameters.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer. This parameter is required as an acknowledgement of the side effect. (Default: false)

api_list.name: updateFileRevision
api_list.description: Updates a revision with patch semantics.

required_parameters.name: fileId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the file.

required_parameters.name: revisionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the revision.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Whether this revision is published. This is only applicable to Google Docs.

optional_parameters.name: keepForever
optional_parameters.description: Whether to keep this revision forever, even if it is no longer the head revision. If not set, the revision will be automatically purged 30 days after newer content is uploaded. This can be set on a maximum of 200 revisions for a file. This field is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive.

optional_parameters.name: publishAuto
optional_parameters.description: Whether subsequent revisions will be automatically republished. This is only applicable to Google Docs.

optional_parameters.name: publishedOutsideDomain
optional_parameters.description: Whether this revision is published outside the domain. This is only applicable to Google Docs.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields.To display all fields, use `*`. Examples: kind, user, storageQuota, importFormats, exportFormats, maxImportSizes, maxUploadSize, appInstalled, folderColorPalette, teamDriveThemes

api_list.name: updateTeamDrive
api_list.description: Updates a Team Drive's metadata.

required_parameters.name: teamDriveId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the Team Drive

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token. Use getAccessToken to get it

optional_parameters.name: backgroundImageFileWidth
optional_parameters.description: Width of image file. If set also set "backgroundImageFileId", "backgroundImageFileXCoordinate", "backgroundImageFileYCoordinate"

optional_parameters.name: colorRgb
optional_parameters.description: The color of this Team Drive as an RGB hex string. It can only be set on a drive.teamdrives.update request that does not set themeId.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundImageFileYCoordinate
optional_parameters.description: xCoordinate of image file. If set also set "backgroundImageFileId", "backgroundImageFileWidth", "backgroundImageFileXCoordinate"

optional_parameters.name: backgroundImageFileYCoordinate
optional_parameters.description: xCoordinate of image file. If set also set "backgroundImageFileId", "backgroundImageFileWidth", "backgroundImageFileXCoordinate"

optional_parameters.name: backgroundImageFileXCoordinate
optional_parameters.description: xCoordinate of image file. If set also set "backgroundImageFileId", "backgroundImageFileWidth", "backgroundImageFileYCoordinate"

optional_parameters.name: themeId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the theme from which the background image and color will be set. The set of possible teamDriveThemes can be retrieved from a drive.about.get response. When not specified on a drive.teamdrives.create request, a random theme is chosen from which the background image and color are set. This is a write-only field; it can only be set on requests that don't set colorRgb or backgroundImageFile.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundImageFileId
optional_parameters.description: Id of image file. If set also set "backgroundImageFileWidth", "backgroundImageFileXCoordinate", "backgroundImageFileYCoordinate"
